snippet: SITNICK--Linda. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Linda Sitnick, who together with her beloved husband, Irving, demonstrated unparalleled generosity that has changed the course of countless lives. Linda expressed her deep devotion to the Jewish community through her role at JFNA, formerly UJC. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Irving, who carries on his commitment to philanthropy through his leadership at The Educational Alliance; her children, Elizabeth (David) and Samuel (Aleksandra); her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: SITNICK--Linda. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Linda Sitnick, who together with her beloved husband, Irving, demonstrated unparalleled generosity that has changed the course of countless lives. Linda expressed her deep devotion to the Jewish community through her role at JFNA, formerly UJC. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Irving, who carries on his commitment to philanthropy through his leadership at The Educational Alliance; her children, Elizabeth (David) and Samuel (Aleksandra); her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
